decideRanges

private void decideRanges()
Get ranges of original BDF and decide new ranges in UFF. 1. How to estimate range size in bytes? Use max h * max w * nchar? 2. Max size of one range must respect PalmOS max record size 64kB 3. Because of preformance/memory (only used ranges will be loaded): devide?
